samples.question: What kind of books do you read?

samples.question: So first question, how has modern transportation changed in the way people travel today compared to the past?
samples.transcript: Modern transportation definitely changed the way people travel nowadays. Especially with airplanes, fastest speed trains, and other way of traveling. So it is safer, more efficient, and it is fast, saves a lot of time. Definitely. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: Modern transportation definitely changed the way people travel nowadays. Especially with airplanes, fastest speed trains, and other way of traveling. So it's safer, more efficient, and it's fast, saves a lot of time. Definitely. Okay.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Modern transportation definitely changed the way people travel nowadays. Especially with airplanes, fastest speed trains, and other way of traveling. So it is safer, more efficient, and it is fast, saves a lot of time. Definitely.

samples.question: If there are some tips to help when traveling, do you have any tips that could help others?
samples.transcript: Well, it depends where you want to go. let us say if I want to travel with my car, so I will make sure I have some tools in my car. So if something breaks down then I can fix my car on my way If I traveling let say I going to Italy so I want I want to wear like comfortable clothes I want to have comfortable shoes and then I want to have a bag some other stuff that I need So it all depends where I going and how I traveling What are advantages of traveling by plane and or train? Well, the plane is the fastest way to travel. So, the advantage of traveling with plane is you save a lot of time. And it is, they say it is the safest, safest way to travel. So, and then the plane is the second safest way to travel, but it is not as fast as, definitely it is not as fast as the plane. Yeah. But still it is a, it is very comfortable to, to travel with the train.

samples.question: What is your job?
samples.transcript: Currently actually I am a student and I have an occupation. I am working as a German teacher in a language academy.
samples.transcript_original: Uh, currently actually I'm a student and I have an occupation. I'm working as a German teacher in a language academy.

samples.question: Okay, and what responsibilities do you have there?
samples.transcript: Actually our liability consists of teaching, students, and supports them if they have some problem in, some languages. Moreover, I am responsible for the income of the other workers in my institute.

samples.question: Okay, and if you had the chance, would you change this job?

samples.question: What do you do in the evenings?
samples.transcript: Actually my whole day consists of study and working and I do not have so much time in order to allocate to my entertainment or hobby. But if I, find some time I would rather to spend it with my family, like, watching films or going out or, dine and eat something at a restaurant.

samples.question: Okay, and now do you prefer to spend evenings with family or friends?
samples.transcript: Actually because I do not have so much time in order to spend with my family. I would rather to, spend this kind of time much more with my family rather than my friends. And, I would rather to just allocate some time at the weekends to my friends. Okay.

samples.question: So, do you ever work or study in the evenings?
samples.transcript: Currently I do not work in the evenings, but, about two years ago I was working, from morning to the evening. So, yes, I just worked at the evening about two years ago. Okay, good. So, let us now talk about family and friends.

samples.question: Do you spend much time with your family?

samples.question: Are there any historical buildings in your hometown?
samples.transcript: Actually, yes. In my hometown, which is Tehran, we have so much, historical buildings. And like, we, we have Golestan Tower, which is located at the middle of the city, and it is completely popular. Every year, so much turrets, just poured into this location in order to visit it. Okay And do people in your country often visit historical buildings actually it depends on person I think some kinds of people like me don have any character in order to spend time in order to visit some monuments and some historical buildings for example in my opinion it look like just a squandering time to visit historical buildings But other people say it say it as an entertainment and they are really engrossed in visiting these kinds of attractions Wow.
